document_data.name: Thickgristle
document_data.mainbody: '''Thickgristle''' was a pirate and the bosun of the ''[[Black Scourge]]''—the flagship of the [[Blackdagger]] pirates led by [[Bartholomew Blackdagger]]—during the early to mid–15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He "lived" out a second existence as one of the pirate king's [[undead]] thralls, forever bound to his [[Pirate King's Retreat|hideaway]] within the flying isle of [[Pirates' Skyhold]].
document_data.Abilities: The massive undead [[orc]] wielded a massive [[greatclub]] in battle.
document_data.Activities: As the ''Black Scourge's'' bosun, Thickgristle was responsible for the upkeep of the ship's equipment as well as managing its crew members.
document_data.History: Thickgristle's undead form was destroyed in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, when the [[Heroes of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] raided the Pirate King's Retreat and put an end to the vile curse that had afflicted the Blackdagger pirates for decades.
